/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history of the city. Cars and bicycles traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, contributing to the lively atmosphere. In the distance, a bridge arches over the street, connecting different parts of the city. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the blend of urban development and natural elements in Beijing.
